ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ تَبَّتْ يَدَآ أَبِى لَهَبٍۢ وَتَبَّ
ayahs.translation: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he.

ayahs.text: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
ayahs.translation: His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained.
He will [enter to] burn in a Fire of [blazing] flame
And his wife [as well] - the carrier of firewood.
Around her neck is a rope of [twisted] fiber.
